articles.title: Facebook Bans False Claims about COVID-19 Vaccines - Newsmax
articles.description: Facebook Inc. said Thursday it would remove false claims about COVID-19 vaccines that have been debunked by public health experts, following a similar announcement by Alphabet Inc.'s YouTube in October.
